meanings.definition: A representation of a person or animal in a solid form, typically made of stone or metal.
meanings.sent1: The statua of the lion in the park looked very realistic.
meanings.sent2: Visitors admired the ancient statua of the goddess in the museum.
meanings.sent3: The pigeons seemed to think the statua of the mayor was a new friend to chat with.
meanings.sent4: The statua of liberty stands tall as a symbol of freedom and hope.
meanings.sent5: The intricate details on the statua of the warrior made it a masterpiece of art.

meanings.definition: A standing figure of a person or animal, typically made of stone or metal.
meanings.sent1: The statua of the king in the courtyard was imposing.
meanings.sent2: The statua of the horse at the entrance welcomed visitors to the estate.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous children tried to play hide-and-seek behind the statua of the knight.
meanings.sent4: In the moonlight, the statua of the angel seemed to come alive.
meanings.sent5: The statua of the famous poet captured his likeness perfectly.
